attributes.action: Removal of dead baby jokes site on facebook
attributes.additional_details:
After little consideration I have decided to set up this petition in order to show how many people are against the dead baby joke sites and how it would be in facebooks best interest to get them removed and banned.

No family whether a loss is suffered or not should have to endure the constant mocking and vile comments made on such sites, but the likes of facebook believe we shouldn't be searching for these forums, what do they expect us to do when they constantly jump up on news feeds.
